mainText:
It's very complicated/difficult to understand how Steve changed the 
world to make people comfortable with computers.  There was something 
special about how he simplified our electronic/mechanical connection 
with them; he had a feeling of how computers should work with people to 
make us all feel good about our Macs, iPhones and iPads.  There's a hole 
in in the computer continuum. I'm not sure he can be replaced.
author: Donald
